configuresubscription.title: SUBSCRIBE TO OPEN CONCEPT LAB
subscriptionurl.label: Subscription URL:
tokenurl.label: Token:
subscription.validationType.checkbox: Disable validation (should be used with care for well curated collections or sources)
nosubscriptionmessage.info: You are not subscribed to Open Concept Lab. Please go to the configuration page to setup the subscription
avoidUpdatesInfo.text: Avoid updating during data entry hours, because the operation may significantly slow down the system
unsubscribeinfo.text: If you unsubscribe, no concepts will be deleted nor changed. All information about subscription will be deleted from your system
